name: Red Room Programming
text: Give to the Bucky Barnes player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Bucky Barnes → remove this card from the game. • Discard the highest printed cost card from your hand and take indirect damage equal to its cost. Discard this obligation.

name: Crossbones
text: Quickstrike. [star] Forced Response: After Crossbones attacks and defeats an ally, place 2 threat on the main scheme. (Winter Soldier's nemesis minion.)

text: Each [[Hydra]] minion gets +1 ATK and +2 hit points. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Hydra]] minion and reveals it. (Shuffle.)

name: High-Tech Armament
text: Attach to Crossbones. Otherwise, attach to the villain. Forced Response: After you attach High-Tech Armament to an enemy, that enemy activates against you. Hero Action: Exhaust a character you control → discard this card.

name: Blizzard

name: Encased in Ice
text:
Attach to your identity.
Attached character cannot attack enemies other than this card.
Any player can attack this card as if it were a minion. If there is 3 or more damage here, move all but 3 damage here to attached character and discard this card.

name: Slippery Conditions
text: Forced Response: After an ally enters play, exhaust it.

name: Whiteout
text:
